colorScale.legendDescription: Are married women required by law to obey their husbands?

title: Married women are required by law to obey their husbands
subtitle: Explicit provision in the law that states a woman must obey her husband, or a provision that states disobedience toward her husband will have legal ramifications for the wife, such as loss of maintenance.
sourceDesc: World Bank, Gender Statistics (based on multiple sources)
